For security reasons we only allow 2 attempts to key in the Single key password
To proceed and reset your Single Key password please type in the last 4 digits of the credit card on file

We provide 100% access to our service for 30 days for absolutely FREE of charge

We don’t ask for your credit card or any other form of payment while you are trying our service.

 For 30 days you can setup as many accounts as you need and have access to our customer support 24/7.

 We are so sure about our service that we know you will like it, we have no reason to lock you into a plan if you don’t wish to continue with us.

 After 30 days you will be asked for your first payment of $3 per account, if you don’t wish to proceed you may cancel anytime

 Here are a few things to keep in mind:
If you are locked out of your account you will need to provide a payment to recover your account

Our system is setup that each Encrypted email is dedicated to one Crypto Wallet. In the event a user will try to use his dedicated Encrypted Email with a different Crypto wallet other than the one setup for it, all Emails will be rejected and the user will be informed that only one account can be used per Encrypted Email, you may have unlimited Emails setup on our system. (Each will incur a $3 fee per Encrypted Email per account per month)
We recommend paying for the whole year to make sure no interruption of service to any of your crypto wallets

The DEFINDOR platform is fully encrypted and designed in a way that that none of our team members can see or download any of the emails that are sent to any user. Even in an event where our platform might (unlikely) get hacked, none of any user information cannot be seen or retrieved. User accounts live on their app and are secured and protected by 256bit end to end encryption.

Go to your Crypto Wallet and swap your main account email with your New DEFINDOR Email we just generated for you \n\nOur Encrypted service will prevent any unauthorized users from approving transactions on your behalf
You can only use the provided email with one account
